title: Adam Ferrara (Top Gear USA, comedian, actor)
description:
Adam Ferrara (@adamferrar) is an accomplished standup comedian and actor. He was one of the original hosts of Top Gear America along with Rutledge Wood and Tanner Foust. You can find his podcast and his latest special, "It's scary in here", at his website. 

 

Right now, you can get a FREE rack of St. Louis Ribs, 1 pack of bacon and 1 pack of pulled pork in your first box. Just go to ButcherBox.com/TIRE

Visit lemonaidhealth.com/TIREfor 50% off your first order of ED medicine.

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

 

Want to see what we're talking about? Watch the show on YouTube!
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Adam Ferrara, Zack Klapman, Matt Farah)
